arv26:47: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrvaṁ dṛḍha-samādānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:51: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ tatra pūrve vicitra-dānopacayena nirvṛttam ||
arv26:55: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve para-sattvājihma-karaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:59: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve sattvānāṁ Dharma-rakṣāvaraṇa-gupti-karaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:63: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve paraparivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:67: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve vividha-prāvaraṇānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:71: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve vipulānnapānānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:75: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve Buddha-dharma-parigrahaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:79: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve guhya-mantra-rakṣaṇatayā | maithuna-dharma-prativisarjanatayā ca nirvṛttam ||
arv26:83: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve subha-karmānupūrvācaraṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:87: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve kuśala-dharma-samācaraṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:91: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve pareṣām-abhayāśvāsadānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:95: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve parakiṅkaraṇīyotsukatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:99: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve daśa-kuśala-karma-pathātapta-samādānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:103: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve glāneṣu vividha-bhaiṣajyānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:107: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve kuśala-mūla-prayoga-paripūryā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:111: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve sarva-sattvāśvāsa-prayogatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:115: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve bhinna-sattva-sandhānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:119: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve svārakṣita-kāya-vāṅ-manas-karmatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:123: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve satya-vacana-saṁrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:127: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve ’pramāṇa-puṇya-skandho(pasevitā)tmatayā parānupradānatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:131: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve snigdha-vacana-satya-pālanatayā ānanda-vacana-śrāvaṇatayā ca nirvṛttam ||
arv26:135: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve maitravat sattva-saṁrakṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:143: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve Dharma-saṁgīti-citta-karmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:151: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve saṁgaṇikā-parivarjanatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:159: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve sarva-prāṇānukampanatayā nihita-loṣṭa-daṇḍa-śastratayā ca nirvṛttam ||
arv26:163: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve varṇārhānāṁ varṇa-bhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:167: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve guru-gaurava-praṇāmatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:171: Tathāgatasyedaṁ mahā-puruṣasya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrve ātmanaḥ para-sattvānāṁ ca samādhau niyojanatayā nirvṛttam ||
arv26:174: Apramāṇaiḥ kuśala-mūlaireśu dharmeṣu vaśavartitvāt Tathāgatasya dvā-triṁśan-mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇāni kāye nirvṛttāni ||
